    @allure.title("Transaction API Padded Fields")
    def test_txn_api_padded_fields(self, txn_samples, fw_api, txn_channel):
        UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER = f'tt_padded_txn_{txn_channel[1]}_{self.current_timestr}'
    
        # Send Transaction
        transaction = copy.deepcopy(txn_samples.BASE_TEST)
        transaction.update({
            'transaction_id_ext': UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER,
            'transaction_channel': str(txn_channel[0])
        })
        # Update all required fields with padd
        for field, api_field in REQUIRED_FIELDS_DISPLAYED.items():
            transaction.update({api_field: "$fw-padded"})
        txn_resp = fw_api.send_transaction(transaction)
